Concussive Vengeance.name: Concussive Vengeance
Concussive Vengeance.flavor: Searing pain courses through you as percussive force from your body strikes out at those nearby.
Concussive Vengeance.attack:
Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity vs. Reflex. You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.
    Level 11: The bonus increases to +4.
    Level 21: The bonus increases to +6.
Concussive Vengeance.onHit: The target takes thunder damage equal to your bloodied value and falls prone.
Concussive Vengeance.effect: You take damage equal to your bloodied value, and you fall prone. This damage cannot be reduced by any means.
Concussive Vengeance.special: If it has not been used for the day, this power automatically triggers when you die.
